notes:
Welcome everyone and set expectations.
Briefly introduce myself and the goal of today’s session.
Mention the structure: what we’ll cover and roughly how long it will take.

Walk through the agenda at a high level.
Highlight any key takeaways or outcomes.
Encourage questions—either during or at the end.

Describe the context that led to this topic.
Explain why it matters and who is affected.
Keep the audience focused on “why they should care.”

Introduce the first major concept.
Give a simple example to make it relatable.
Reinforce how this point ties back to the larger goal.

Invite questions and encourage participation.
If no one speaks up, offer a common question you’ve heard before.
Thank them for attending.
